description: Nefertari Vivi is the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch3060 [Nefertari Cobra] and the princess of Arabasta. She is a formerly frontier agent Miss Wednesday of http://anidb.net/ch2939 [Baroque Works] together with http://anidb.net/ch3031 [Igaram]. She travels with the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hats] during the Baroque Works Saga. Vivi is considered a crewmate of the Straw Hats even though she no longer travels with them.
name: Nefertari Vivi
